## BaseCounterStyleRenderer interface


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface BaseCounterStyleRenderer 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [maxCounterLenInRange(min, max)](./counter-style.basecounterstylerenderer.maxcounterleninrange.md) | Get the maximum counter representation length given an index range. If a fallback is defined, it will be used for values outside the range boundaries of this renderer. |
|  [maxMarkerLenInRange(min, max)](./counter-style.basecounterstylerenderer.maxmarkerleninrange.md) | Get the maximum marker string length given an index range. If a fallback is defined, it will be used for values outside the range boundaries of this renderer. |
|  [renderCounter(index)](./counter-style.basecounterstylerenderer.rendercounter.md) | Render an index into its counter representation, equivalent to CSS <code>counter</code> function. See [CSS Counter Styles Level 3, Counter Styles](https://www.w3.org/TR/css-counter-styles-3/#generate-a-counter)<!-- -->. |
|  [renderMarker(index)](./counter-style.basecounterstylerenderer.rendermarker.md) | Render an index into its corresponding marker string. See [CSS Lists Level 3, Text-based Markers](https://www.w3.org/TR/css-lists-3/#text-markers)<!-- -->. |
